name: Dust - Lost In Time
description:
Enter the world of Dust - An adventure into a vintage past.
You are a young explorer set with the task of exploring an old house.
You are challenged to solve each room one by one.

FEATURES:
3D Graphics
Original Soundtrack
Loads of Puzzles
Adventure Gameplay
Touch controls


CONTROLS:
Simply tap to navigate.
Tap on objects to use the menu of options.
When rotating 3D objects, tap and drag on the object.


COMPATIBILITY:
Due to the 3D graphics, Dust is compatible with the following:
iPhone 5 and above
iPad 4 and above
iPad Mini 2 and above
Latest iPod Touch
